name: createTransaction
description: Creates a transaction that can be an income, expense or transfer

description.description: Transaction description. A summary according to the purchased items, it should be at most 100 characters long

amount.description: Transaction amount in COP. Remove the thousand separators. This value is usually next to a label Venta, Total, etc. e.g. 123000, 15000, 1000, 20000.34

type.description: Transaction type: income, expense or transfer

category.description: Transaction category, e.g. Alimentos, Educaci√≥n, Salud, Transporte, Ocio, Servicios

sourceAccount.description: Source account if it applies. This is the account where the money comes from

date.description: Transaction date and time in ISO format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm
